pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:5.1: 83. The training rule on one year
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:6.2: At that time the nuns gave the full ordination to two women per year,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:6.3: and the nuns’ dwelling place still did not have sufficient capacity.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:6.5: “How can the nuns give the full ordination to two women per year?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:6.6: The nuns’ dwelling place still doesn’t have sufficient capacity.”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.1: The nuns heard the complaints of those people.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.2: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.3: “How can the nuns give the full ordination to two women per year?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.4: “Is it true, monks, that the nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.7: How can the nuns give the full ordination to two women per year?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.8: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:7.9: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:8.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to two women in one year, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:10.3: Gives the full ordination to two women:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:10.4: gives the full ordination to two women.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:11.1: If, intending to give the full ordination to two women, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:11.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:11.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:11.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:11.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:12.4: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:13.1: The thirteenth training rule is finished.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc83:13.2: The eighth chapter on unmarried girls is finished.
